messages.message: Hi everyone! We just deployed a new quick view feature to the file system on dogfood. When you select a text/PDF/image file, you’ll see a preview of the file on the right-hand side of the screen. This will be included in the upcoming code cut for prod. Please let us know in <#CLBGA5A7K|> if you notice any bugs or usability issues!
great @Serena what Jira can I follow for this cool quick view feature? I want to include in release notes.
I wrote this doc describing the feature in more detail: https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PEXP/pages/699006977/Proposal+File+System+Quick+View

This is so cool, @Serena! I chatted with @Jessica and we wanted to get @Cristele to review this first to make sure we're not introducing too much user thrash since very soon we'll also have a refresh of the file picker AND OS LAYOUT this quarter. @Barrie, that being said, we're not planning to release this yet in Nov so no docs for now (but we'll need it for sure when ready to release).
thanks, I saw some that could be improved - like the ratio real estate for preview vs list of the files (width much bigger on the list than preview), background of the preview (probably too dark,...)
thanks for inspiring this with your hack week project @Travis!
you got that deployed fast, love to see it!
